·         Duelist (Duellante). Requirements: 1 level by Fighter, 13 Dexterity, Expertise, 8 parry points. Benefits: counts Fighter levels to calculate CL of these feat: Barbarian rage, Greater rage, Shadow evade, Smite devil(good), Divine might, Divine shield, Ki damage, Wholeness of body, Tymora's smile, Use poison, Arrow of death, Imbue arrow, Bull's strength, Divine wrath, Dragon breath.
 
·         Supreme Fighter (Combattente Supremo). Requirements: 36 Strength points, 22 Constitution points. Benefits: Gets an item that gives 10% immunity to physical damage. This item is usable 3 times a day, the effect has a duration of 10 rounds +1 for each level of the character
 
·         Gladiator (Gladiatore). Requirements: 40 levels by Fighter. Benefits: he has a bonus of 20 CL to use the Protection Rod(Verga della protezione) and to calculate the maximum reduction, gets +6 to the constitution and +10 to the strength, if in possession of Perfect Health Gladiator gains immunity to all mind-affecting spell.
 
·         Legionnaire (Legionario). Requirements: 80 Fighter levels, Called shot, Improved knockdown. Benefits: bonus of 10% physical damage immunity on the object of the CDV Supreme Fi, bonus of +10 physical damage reduction on the protection rod, acquires an object that provides an attack bonus of +25 usable three times a day. The benefits of the Legionnaire will be deactivated if any classes other than the Fighter one are chosen.
 
Praetorian Guard (Guardia pretoriana). Requirements: 120 Fighter levels, Improved Expertise, Improved Whirlwind Attack. Benefits: epic dodge, poison weapon, 50% concealment, base attack bonus is raised to 40. For the Praetorian Guard only, poison weapon adds divine damages and the damage bonus is 2*CL.
